name: Trapdoor Hero
description:
------------------------------------------------------------ How deep can you go?

Trapdoor hero is an infinite game where you must clear the current floor of dangerous enemies and proceed to the next one. You have your trusty sword and shield at your side, but be careful! The monsters can come from anywhere!

  • You have 360º aim! Find your enemies and hurl swords at them!
  • Block your enemy attacks using your shield, but watch out for your stamina!
  • Not a fan of blocking? You can always dodge, but you need to be precise!
  • Keep an eye open for chests, break them open for a powerful surprise!
------------------------------------------------------------ WARNING
  • Your phone will need a working Gyroscope for the game to work!
  • At the moment, the game is only available for Android users!
------------------------------------------------------------ Controls
  • Move your phone around in order to aim. Enemies and chests can be anywhere around you!
  • Tap right to throw swords. Useful for enemies, chests and activating buffs!
  • Tap left to block attacks. Less effective against wizards and not effective at all against ogres!
  • Tap bottom to dodge attacks. Timing is key!
------------------------------------------------------------ Thanks!

Thanks for playing! This is our first mobile game and we would love to listen to your feedback!

If people like this, we'll be adding more content! :)
